plugin.name: shiro-ui
plugin.author: Yellowsnow
plugin.title: A basic Shiro User Interface
plugin.description:
\ This plugin tries to provide a basic user interface for shiro plugin.
It provides the following features : * User and Role management frontends with basic permission configuration * Password recovery via email * Password update * Default admin user
RoadMap * User sign-up * Allow custom permissions such as "book:buy,sell:1,2" * Email templates
